comment.author: 64768623@N08
comment._content:
It was a wonderful theatre.
Such a shame this building was demolished.
Like most of the Lynn Street and Whitby Street areas, it has been torn down.
The heart has been ripped out of Hartlepool. Those who make these decisions should be ashamed of themselves. Nowadays the Empire would have been Grade I listed.

comment.author: 71030357@N05
comment._content: totally agree, i wonder if any of these cretins are still living, so they can be shamed??
